properties.description: Basic Example of moving data and data transforming from Rest API to Azure SQL server using REST API, Key Vault and Blob Storage

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	SpecCode as string ('feedback'),
	Runtime as string ('123456_123456'),
	FileName as string ('test.csv')
}
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		{Product } as string,
		Feedback as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['*.csv']) ~> CustomerFeedback
source(output(
		id as string,
		sentiment as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine',
	preferredIntegralType: 'integer',
	wildcardPaths:['*.json']) ~> SentimentalAnalysis
CustomerFeedback, SentimentalAnalysis join(CustomerID == id,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join
Join aggregate(groupBy(sentiment),
	total = count(sentiment)) ~> GroupBySentiment
GroupBySentiment sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:[(concat($FileName,'_', $Runtime,'.csv'))],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sinkBLOB
Join sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> SinkSQLTable

source(output(
		id_odsp as string,
		id_event as string,
		sort_order as string,
		time as string,
		text as string,
		event_type as string,
		event_type2 as string,
		side as string,
		event_team as string,
		opponent as string,
		player as string,
		player2 as string,
		player_in as string,
		player_out as string,
		shot_place as string,
		shot_outcome as string,
		is_goal as string,
		location as string,
		bodypart as string,
		assist_method as string,
		situation as string,
		fast_break as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> EventData
EventData sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	store: 'cache',
	format: 'inline',
	output: true,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> sinkEventData

source(output(
		status as string,
		data as (id as string, employee_name as string, employee_salary as string, employee_age as string, profile_image as string)[],
		message as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> source
source foldDown(unroll(data, data),
	mapColumn(
		status,
		data,
		message
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten
Flatten sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		data = data.id,
		employee_name = data.employee_name,
		employee_salary = data.employee_salary,
		employee_age = data.employee_age,
		profile_image = data.profile_image
	)) ~> sinkASQL
